typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		{Region ID} as integer,
		Target as decimal(18,5)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtTargetTable
source(output(
		{Categoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Descripcion Categoria} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTProductosCategoria
source(output(
		{Subcategoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Categoria Producto ID} as string,
		{Descripcion Subcategoria} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTProductosSubcategoria
source(output(
		{Producto ID} as string,
		{Numero Producto} as string,
		{Producto Sub Categoria ID} as string,
		{Nombre Producto} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtLTProductos
ExtTargetTable keyGenerate(output(PK_Metas as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> AgregarSurrogateKey
ExtLTProductos, ExtLTProductosCategoria, ExtLTProductosSubcategoria union(byName: true)~> UnionProductTabales
AgregarSurrogateKey sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		PK_Meta as integer,
		{Año} as integer,
		Mes as integer,
		Region_ID as integer,
		TARGET as decimal(18,5)
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Truncate Table DIM_Metas'],
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		PK_Meta = PK_Metas,
		{Año},
		Mes,
		Region_ID = {Region ID},
		TARGET = Target
	)) ~> AlmacenarMetasDWH
UnionProductTabales sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> AlmacenarProducto
